Uses of Class
items.Upgrade

Packages that use Upgrade 
Package Description
islands
Contains all the islands and island-associated classes (like Route)
items
Contains all upgrades and item classes

    Modifier and Type Field Description

    Methods in islands that return Upgrade 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Upgrade[] Store.getPossibleUpgrades()  
    Methods in islands that return types with arguments of type Upgrade 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<Upgrade> Store.getUpgrades()  
    Methods in islands with parameters of type Upgrade 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Store.addUpgrade​(Upgrade upgrade)
    Adds the given upgrade into the store's upgrade pool
    void Store.removeUpgrade​(Upgrade toBeBought)
    Takes an upgrade, and removes the first upgrade of its type in the upgrade pool
    int Store.sellUpgrade​(Upgrade upgrade)
    Puts the given upgrade back into the store's upgrade pool, returning the upgrade's value

  • Uses of Upgrade in items

    Subclasses of Upgrade in items 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Cannon
    Cannons are upgrade items, used to increase combat rolls.
    class  Sail
    Sails are upgrade items, used to decrease the time to get between Islands.
